mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.email, u.nickname, u.profile_image as profileImage, u.gender, u.height, u.current_weight as currentWeight, u.age, u.activity_level as activityLevel, u.goal_weight as goalWeight, u.type, u.my_intro as myIntro, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM friendship WHERE user1_id = u.id OR user2_id = u.id) as friendCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM friendship WHERE user1_id = u.id) as userId1, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM friendship WHERE user2_id = u.id) as userId2 FROM user u WHERE u.id = #{userId}

SELECT u.id, u.email, u.nickname, u.profile_image as profileImage, u.gender, u.my_intro as myIntro, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM friendship WHERE user1_id = u.id OR user2_id = u.id) as friendCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM friendship WHERE user1_id = u.id) as userId1, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM friendship WHERE user2_id = u.id) as userId2 FROM user u WHERE u.id != #{currentUserId} ORDER BY u.nickname
